com.jme3.input.controls
Interface AnalogListener

All Superinterfaces:
InputListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChaseCamera, CubeField, FlyByCamera, TestAttachGhostObject, TestChaseCamera, TestHoveringTank, TestJoystick, TestParallelProjection, TestPhysicsHingeJoint
public interface AnalogListener
extends InputListener

AnalogListener is used to receive events of inputs in analog format. As a value from 0 to 1.

Method Summary
 void onAnalog(java.lang.String name, float value, float tpf)
          Called to notify the implementation that an analog event has occured.
 

Method Detail

onAnalog

void onAnalog(java.lang.String name,
              float value,
              float tpf)
Called to notify the implementation that an analog event has occured. The results of KeyTrigger and MouseButtonTrigger events will have tpf == value.

Parameters:
name - - the name of the analog event
value - - how much the axis changed during this event
tpf - - how much time has passed since the last frame
